name: Clif Bar Coconut Chocolate Chip Energy Bar
description:
Love coconut? Love chocolate chips? You’re home.Ingredients: organic brown rice syrup, ClifPro® (soy rice crisps [soy protein isolate, rice flour, barley malt extract], organic roasted soybeans, organic soy flour), organic rolled oats, organic toasted oats (organic oats, organic dried cane syrup, ascorbic acid, natural vitamin E), organic cane syrup, chocolate chips (dried cane syrup, unsweetened chocolate, cocoa butter, soy lecithin, vanilla extract), ClifCrunch® (organic oat fiber, inulin [chicory extract], organic milled flaxseed, psyllium), organic coconut, organic date paste, organic sunflower oil, natural flavors, sea salt, natural vitamin E.
